fields.fieldTitle: The website you're welcoming them to
The niche group of people you target (plural)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: For Sale By Owners | FSBOs | New Ebook Writers

fields.fieldTitle: Big result they want in general from their life/business.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell your house yourself without an agent!; write a highly profitable ebook

fields.fieldTitle: A BIG "how to" secret they really want to know!

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to quickly get your house sold and save the HUGE real estate commissions | how to write a REAL ebook in less than a week

fields.fieldTitle: What bribe do they get when they opt in?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Free Video, Free Video Series, Free Report, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: "Insider strategy" this OTO uses to help get the big payoff?

fieldHint.hint1: "We've created a [free video] for you that explains _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: the three biggest hurdles every For Sale By Owner faces AND how to overcome them | 5 Things every new author can write about to create a great book

fields.fieldTitle: Big takeway or "reveal" you make on the next page (sales page?)

fieldHint.hint1: Also, on the next page you'll get all the details about how you can immediately ______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: get started selling your house yourself and save the HUGE real estate commissions | start writing your own outrageously profitable ebook as fast as this weekend
